theme.name: brujoen
theme.label: Brugges and Jo Liquid
theme.desc:
A graphical theme for Plume! CMS under Creative Commons license:
The liquid design fits the user screen in the 780/1800 pixels range.
Most of the icons come from Mark James's Silk icon set 1.3 and Icon Buffet's Tower Grove set.
Designed for Firefox v1.5, css hacks for Opera v9, IE v7, no-transparency versions for IE v6, v5.x
Feel free to use, modify, share alike, under by-nc-sa cc-license.
